Method Detail

getDependency

public static java.lang.Object getDependency(java.lang.Class dependenciesClass,
                                             java.lang.Class dependencyInterface)
Given a dependencies class (like PLDependencies.class), and the dependency to look for, tries to retrieve the class. Note that this is not the recommended approach since it is type-unsafe and inefficient.

Returns:
the dependency, or null if it cannot be found

saveDependencies

public static DependenciesState saveDependencies(java.lang.Class dependenciesClass)
Saves the state of all the dependencies in the class Returns a DependenciesState obj
